ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We gave him the good news of Ishaq, a Prophet, one of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So We gave him the good news of Isaac, apostle, who is among the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And We gave him the good news of Isaac, a Prophet and among the righteous ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We gave him the glad news of the birth of Isaac, one of the righteous Prophets.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We gave him the glad tidings of Ishaq, a Herald of the Hidden, from among those who deserve Our proximity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We gave him the glad tidings of Ishaq -- a Prophet from the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We gave him the good news of Ishaq, a prophet among the good ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then We gave him the good tidings of Isaac, a Prophet, one of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And we gave him tidings of the birth of Isaac, a prophet of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We gave Abraham the good news of Isaac, a prophet and a righteous man,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We gave him the glad tidings of Is-haq, a prophet, and of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And We gave him the good news of [the birth of] Isaac, a prophet, one of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We gave him the good news of Isaac - a prophet,- one of the Righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We gave him the glad tidings of Ishaque (Isaac) a Prophet from the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then, We gave him the glad tidings of Isaac, a Prophet, one of the righteous,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We gave him good news of Isaac, a prophet, one of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We gave him good tidings of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:112] And We gave him the good tidings of [the birth of] Isaac — some have argued that this proves that the one who was sacrificed was not him [Isaac] — a prophet (nabiyyan is a future circumstantial qualifier, that is to say, ‘he will come to be, with his prophethood decreed), one of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We gave him tidings of the birth of Isaac, a Prophet of the righteous) of the messengers.
